decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun the expiration of three years from the 31/03/2014.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PP-01, PP-02 and location plan received on 13/02/2014 and PP-003 and PP04, received on 17/02/2014 and details received 18/11/2016.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Within three months of this decision samples of the materials used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority and retained thereafter in accordance with the approved drawings.
Condition : 4 - The remaining upper terrace shall be retained permanently for communal amenity space for the use of all residents in the block.
description: Application to remove Condition 4 (landscape plan) of Planning permission 01137/223(F9)/P2 dated 31/03/2014 for Erection of a part third floor extension
